metadata.name: Experience 0xBABE01
metadata.description:
DEVOTION is a Limited Series of 10 photographs. Each one can be redeemed for a **private immersive art experience** made just for you.

The holder has the power to summon the Cryptob√¶bes across the world, preparing a mysterious dusk-til-dawn experience reminiscent of David Fincher's *The Game*. **[Read the full story and game rules](https://cryptobabes.org)**.

DEVOTION is the first NFT of its kind, merging the digital and material worlds. Only 10 people in the world will get to experience it.

Our work is transgressive yet soft. It sensually explores the boundaries of human connection in this new Era.

**[COME PLAY WITH US](https://cryptobabes.org)**
